Articles.Content:
SkyStorm

Before we start, I would like to explain how this series came about. First off, I saw an old post from my new partner, fulgur, and it was asking if anyone wanted to do a fan fiction together. So, naturally, I contacted him about it, and we soon discussed what needed to be done, I asked him if he could get the pics and gameplay, cause I play on Xbox, and he said his PC was down on RAM for a while. About a month later, he contacted me about  getting it restarted, and I was glad to unpause this idea and see it grow. And it has gone from there.

MOD LIST

Chapter 1

GETTING STARTED

                Jeb sat in the cramped cockpit, waiting for liftoff, he was excited about having him be the first Kerbonaut to ever launch! 3...2…1, and Jeb was gone. Jeb was at about 8km up, when the flea SRB ran out of fuel, and he began his trip back down.

 

 

 

 

 

Soon enough, Jeb was back, and another rocket, the A2, was launched, with Val at the controls. Like the LKLA-1, this was a highly successful mission, and LKLA-2 was successful, and Val returned safely.

A-2, with two hammers, a swivel and a pug.

 

Ascent to orbit.

 

Here, you see the Pug and the fuel stage helping to protect from the heating of re-entry.

Soon after the success of LKLA-2, a scan-sat mission was sent into polar orbit, to do resource scanning and to test all of the systems with the scan-sat device to ensure it will work properly

1st  Stage Separation at 5 kicks

2nd Stage Separation at 50 klicks

 

Post re-entry of LKLA-3

With the first three major flights of the newly founded M&K Space Program and the newly opened Kerbal Space center complete, and all of the brave and daring Kerbonauts back home, there was nothing but celebration from all of the staff of MKSP, and Fulgur Kerman and Mikenike Kerman were spotted with Jeb on their shoulders, and champagne bottles in their hands.  As they left for the evening, Fulgur told Mikenike,” In two years time, we will be everywhere in the system, Rovers and bases on Duna, miners on Ike, a space station around Kerbin and the Mun! Two years, friend, is all I want and all we ever needed!”

Please let my partner @fulgur have the first post after every chapter, so he can inform you of when the later game craft are added to kerbalx and any other major updates to this series.

Thank you!!

I really don't need the first post after every chapter, but until my partner wakes up and finds that I have been telling him how to insert pictures and shouting, "I WANTED THE FIRST POST! FOR A MODLIST! AND KERBALX LINKS!", here are some teasers:

This was the A-3, which I sent into polar orbit to do some SCANsat-ing of Kerbin.

And this Bob Kerman in polar orbit of the Mun.

Edited December 17, 2019 by fulgur
